object.name: InlineQueryResultCachedVideo
object.description: Represents a link to a video file stored on the Telegram servers. By default, this video file will be sent by the user with an optional caption. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the video.
object.html_description: Represents a link to a video file stored on the Telegram servers. By default, this video file will be sent by the user with an optional caption. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the video.
object.rst_description: Represents a link to a video file stored on the Telegram servers. By default, this video file will be sent by the user with an optional caption. Alternatively, you can use *input_message_content* to send a message with the specified content instead of the video.

annotations.description: Type of the result, must be video
annotations.rst_description: Type of the result, must be *video*
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 bytes
annotations.name: id

annotations.description: A valid file identifier for the video file
annotations.html_description: A valid file identifier for the video file
annotations.rst_description: A valid file identifier for the video file
annotations.name: video_file_id

annotations.description: Caption of the video to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.html_description: Optional. Caption of the video to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Caption of the video to be sent, 0-1024 characters after entities parsing
annotations.name: caption

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the video caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Mode for parsing entities in the video caption. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Mode for parsing entities in the video caption. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: parse_mode

annotations.description: List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.html_description: Optional. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. List of special entities that appear in the caption, which can be specified instead of *parse_mode*
annotations.name: caption_entities

annotations.description: Inline keyboard attached to the message
annotations.name: reply_markup

annotations.description: Content of the message to be sent instead of the video
annotations.html_description: Optional. Content of the message to be sent instead of the video
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Content of the message to be sent instead of the video
annotations.name: input_message_content
